example_utterances: Yes, I need to drive these nails in to keep the table from wobbling.
Of course, but I'll need to supervise you closely. Safety first.
That's a good idea. Let me grab some work gloves for both of us.
Yes, I remember. That was a fun project. We should do something like that again soon.
And it's a good way to learn new skills and teach you important things, like how to handle a hammer safely.
Exactly. And that's why it's important to always practice safety and work together when using tools like a hammer.
I couldn't believe you did that, child. It was unforgivable.
You know exactly what you did. I saw it with my own eyes.
You broke my favorite vase and didn't even bother to apologize or try to fix it.
No. That vase was irreplaceable. I can't even look at you right now.
